attributes.action: Lower Prices of Petrol and Diesel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
prices have now gone over £1 per litre for diesel and petrol. 

This is a Disgrace, oil prices are high but its the amount of tax the government are adding to the oil prices that makes it more expensive.

everyone pays the same for oil and yet we are being charged more than most countries in Europe not to mention anywhere else in the world!!

The Prime Minister must listen to the people and do something to cut our taxes as we already pay high tax on buying a car, taxing the car and then to run it aswell.

Every motorist has a right to have pump prices lowered but we need the government to comply and sort this out as its gone well beyond a joke.

please sign and post the link to any other mototists you know.

thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
